selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the area of square C using the Pythagorean theorem.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric to compute the area of square C as the sum of the areas of squares A and B.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use format_final to return the answer in the format 'Answer: X' where X is the option label.
